flawed_nl_solution:
The garden is 220 * 120 = <<220*120=2640>>2640 square feet.
The tilled land will take up half the area, and the trellises and raised beds will be the other half. Each half is 2640 / 2 = <<2640/2=1320>>1320 square feet.
The trellises will take up 1/3 of the remaining land, so the raised beds will take 1 - 1/3 = 2/3 of the remaining land.
So the total area of the raised bed area will be 1320 square feet * (2/3) = <<1320*(2/3)=880>>880 square feet.
#### 880

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26400, not 2640. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
